name: @nouns/subgraph
description: A subgraph that indexes nouns events
author: Nounders

scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn clean && yarn prepare:rinkeby && yarn codegen && yarn deploy nouns-dao/nouns-subgraph-rinkeby
